title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message: On the bench I have an otherwise pristine 820-00163 logic board. The original issue was the KB needed to be replaced. I replaced the KB, all of the keys work but the CAPS lock light does not. The customer REALLY wants the light to work, so before you tell me to tell them to just live with it, lets just say that is not an option. So far, I have replaced U4820, Q4840, checked R4814 and R4815. I have also tried 3 different keyboards, same result. I put a different logic board in the chassis and the caps lock light does indeed work in the machine so I know it is a board issue. Everything seems to be in order yet the light still does not work. Does anyone have any other Ideas where to look? I am at my wits end with this as it seems to be such a simple thing.

title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message:
Do you get 3V at pin 30/J4813?
If yes, check R4814.

I suppose Caps Lock key works, only its light not.

title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message: Yes. And caps lock key does work.

title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message:
R4814 is good???
Check its traces too.

title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message: R4814 is 113 Ohms. Traces were checked and are good.

title: 820-00163 No Caps lock light - lets solve this.
message:
Check R/Q4840 and their traces.
Gate of Q4840 reacts when pressing Caps Lock?
